pages.text: Affects healing spells. Healing spells effects are amplified 1 levels and their effect duration is increased 50%. Affects:$(li)Path of Redemption$()

pages.mod_text: You scepter has become adept at casting healing spells. Imbues onto the Scepter of the pacifist of onto Redemption if you don't complete the Pacifists Path of Redemption
